name: Box in an RPG
description:
You're busy adventuring up a storm, when suddenly you come across a mysterious box!

"What could be inside?" you wonder to yourself.

Maybe it's filled with treasure! Or perhaps an ancient artifact! *GASP* What if it's full of adorable little kittens!?

Your curiosity has gotten the better of you, and now you NEED to know what's in that box!

-CONTROLS-

  • WASD or arrow keys to move (Q&E to sidestep)
  • Spacebar to interact/attack
